fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Competition, Business and Industry, Environment, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
EU feed legislation 
REFIT initiative 
market economy status for China
organisation_name: European Manufacturers of Feed Minerals Association (EMFEMA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Advisory Group on the Food Chain and Animal and Plant Health#E00860#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=860#Not a member#C#Animal Health Advisory Committee
membership:
EMFEMA is associated member of FEFAC (European Feed Manufacturers' Federation) 
EMFEMA is member of the Feed Chain Task Force, the industry platform taking care of the EU Feed Materials Catalogue 
EMFEMA is member of PARI-EFSA (Partnership of 
Associations Representing Industries within EFSA’s Remit)
goals__remit: Inform and support members to conform to legal obligations of high quality standards respecting food and feed safety as well as the environment; contact and cooperate with other professional organizations with similar interests; cooperate with European and national authorities to create and maintain the correct legal environment for the safe and sustainable use of its products; stimulate scientific research and developments in the field; inform end-users, schools, universities and the public of the technical and nutritional value of products for animal feeding.
legal_status: association sans but lucratif / vereniging zonder winstoogmerk
